title: Solution Engineer to SEB
description:
*SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone.*
**What You Will Be Doing**
 Do you want to be part of our exciting solution rebuild? We will transition into a more modern Test Data Management (TDM) solution. Instead of developing our solution we will leverage the benefit of using a standard solution and develop it to our needs and requirements. We will add more value to our customers by proactively providing consistent test data. Join us on our journey!
   

  

 You will be part of a professional Agile team responsible for providing tools for test data creation and de-identification that enable other SEB development teams to easily test their solutions. You will share your responsibilities with other team members.
   

  

**As Solution Engineer in our Test Data team, you will be responsible for:**
* Implement a new modern Test Data Management solution.
* Administrate, configure, and maintain the new solution.
* Maintain current solutions during the transition period and support stakeholders (internal SEB development teams).
* Guiding the teams to prepare the right test data for their testing.


**Who We Are Looking For**
* Experienced in Java and database development.
* Experience with database architecture and design.
* Experience in bash scripting and automation.
* Experience in developing with Angular.
* Experienced with testing and knowledge of what kind of test data is required.
* Have technical knowledge in how to build and run applications for different platforms, experience in working with containers (Docker, OpenShift), infrastructure as code, automation, and continuous integration.
* Having a good understanding and passion for DevOps and Cloud technology to create effective and future-proof solutions.
* Have experience in an enterprise environment (preferably financial or IT sectors).


**What We Offer**
* Attractive compensation and benefits
* Access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits
* Flexible work-life balance
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Innovative company at the forefront of technology
* Agile and modern ways of working


**Learn More About Working At SEB At Www.sebgroup.com/career**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity are crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe, or where they come from.
   

  

 We are looking forward to your application, but not later than
 **30/6-2024.**
 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today.

title: Customer Engineer, Networking
description:
**Minimum Qualifications**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or equivalent practical experience.
* Experience in cloud computing (e.g., infrastructure, storage, platforms, data), cloud market, and customer buying behavior.
* Experience in networking (e.g., Network Virtualization, Open Protocols, Application Acceleration/Load Balancing, Virtual Private Networks).


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Master's degree in Computer Science, or a related technical field.
* Experience as a Technical Sales Engineer in cloud computing or a customer-facing role in a professional services/systems engineering team.
* Experience in installing, optimizing, and maintaining cross-country networks, leveraging traditional and innovative protocol frameworks.
* Experience managing complex network implementations, with an understanding of the ISO Open Systems Interconnection (OSI) Layer protocols.
* Knowledge of traditional routing protocols, such as TCP/IP, MPLS-VPN, IPSEC, Load Balancing, Network Security, DNS, Encryption, and QoS.
* Ability to learn, understand, and work with new technologies, methodologies, solutions in cloud/IT.


**About The Job**
 The Google Cloud Platform team helps customers transform and build what's next for their business — all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are developed for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. Our teams are dedicated to helping our customers — developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies — see the benefits of our technology come to life. As part of an entrepreneurial team in this rapidly growing business, you will play a key role in understanding the needs of our customers and help shape the future of businesses of all sizes use technology to connect with customers, employees and partners.
   

  

 Google Cloud accelerates every organization’s ability to digitally transform its business and industry. We deliver enterprise-grade solutions that leverage Google’s cutting-edge technology, and tools that help developers build more sustainably. Customers in more than 200 countries and territories turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to enable growth and solve their most critical business problems.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Identify business/technical requirements, conduct full technical discovery, and architect client solutions to meet gathered requirements.
* Lead the technical project, including technology advocacy, supporting bid responses, product and solution briefings, proof-of-concept work, and coordinate supporting technical resources.
* Work with Google Cloud Platform products to demonstrate and prototype integrations in customer/partner environments. Travel across EMEA for meetings, technical reviews, and onsite delivery activities, as needed.
* Prepare and deliver product messaging to highlight Google Cloud Platform value proposition using whiteboard and slide presentations, product demonstrations, white papers, trial management, and Request for Information (RFI) response documents.
* Provide recommendations on integration strategies, enterprise architectures, and platforms/application infrastructure to implement a complete solution. Provide advice to customers to optimize Google Cloud Platform effectiveness.


 Information collected and processed as part of your Google Careers profile, and any job applications you choose to submit is subject to Google's Applicant and Candidate Privacy Policy.
   

  

 Google is proud to be an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We are committed to building a workforce that is representative of the users we serve, creating a culture of belonging, and providing an equal employment opportunity regardless of race, creed, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, national origin, disability, age, genetic information, veteran status, marital status, pregnancy or related condition (including breastfeeding), expecting or parents-to-be, criminal histories consistent with legal requirements, or any other basis protected by law. See also Google's EEO Policy, Know your rights: workplace discrimination is illegal, Belonging at Google, and How we hire.
   

  

 If you have a need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form.
   

  

 Google is a global company and, in order to facilitate efficient collaboration and communication globally, English proficiency is a requirement for all roles unless stated otherwise in the job posting.
   

  

 To all recruitment agencies: Google does not accept agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Google employees, or any other organization location. Google is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

title: Power System Engineer
description:
Vill du vara med och forma framtidens energilandskap och göra verklig skillnad för kommande generationer?
 



  





 Som Systemingenjör hos oss på Ntricity tar du en central roll i att utveckla och implementera innovativa och effektiva lösningar inom hållbar energi, vilket bidrar till en mer hållbar framtid. Vårt mäl är att göra hållbarhet tillgänglig och lönsam för alla.
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Dina dagar kommer att variera från att skriva specifikationsdokument till att besöka anläggningar och träffa kunder. Du kommer att ansvara för våra systemlösningar och definiera hur flexibla resurser som vindkraftparker, flexibla industriresurser och solkraftanläggningar med batterilager i megawatt-storlek ska fungera och styras.
 



  





 Ditt huvudansvar är att skapa en tydlig systembeskrivning för hur våra viktigaste resurser fungerar och att säkerställa att vi har full kontroll över hur sol, vind, batterier och etc. hanteras. Du kommer ta fram systemlösningen för att optimera användningen av dessa resurser. Det innebär att du aktivt bidrar till att forma och säkerställa att anläggningarna utnyttjas på ett effektivt sätt.
 



  





 Tillsammans med våra mjukvaru- och integrationsingenjörer kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att utveckla en kontrollstrategi. Denna strategi syftar till att säkerställa optimal användning av anläggningarna, vilket gynnar både kundens ekonomi och stöder klimatmålen inom den gröna omställningen.
 



  





 De flesta av våra anläggningar kopplas upp mot Svenskakraftnäts stödtjänstmarknader och det är din uppgift att driva förkvalificeringsansökningarna mot Svenska Kraftnät.
 



  





**Vem är du?** 



* Du är en erfaren Systemingenjör som jobbat inom elkraft, gärna inom batteri, vind eller solkraft. Där har du arbetat med systemdesign inkl. specifikationer och kontrollstrategier. Kanske har du även jobbat med stödtjänster.
* Du vill gärna jobba i ett litet bolag där vi hjälper varandra, med både högt och lågt.
* Du talar och skriver både svenska och engelska obehindrat



  





**Vilka är vi?** 




 Energibranschen står inför en enorm förändring – från storskalig energiproduktion till lokal, decentraliserad förnyelsebar produktion och lagring av energi. Vår mjukvara banar väg för företag att effektivt integreras med elmarknaden, vilket underlättar försäljning av förnybar energi från batterilagring, solenergi och vindkraft vid tidpunkter som ger bäst betalt. Vi är stolta över att ha ett team bestående av några av branschens bästa och mest engagerade experter, som är dedikerade att göra förnybara energikällor lönsamma.
 



  





**Bra att veta** 




 Placeringsort är Stockholm, resor förekommer. Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med tillträde snarast. Vi tillämpar 6 månaders provanställning.
 



 Vi är på semester fram till den 12/8 och kommer därför inte kunna återkoppla förrän efter det.
